projects.jetsonBasecallingDescription: An experimental edge computing platform that deploys multiple neural network DNA/RNA basecalling models on a cluster of NVIDIA Jetson Nano devices. The project explores feasibility, performance, energy efficiency, and deployment automation of nanopore signal (FAST5) â†’ nucleotide sequence inference at the network edge rather than relying on centralized GPU servers. K3s - lightweight of kubernetes - help a lot to manage infrastructure of cluster and container orchestration.
projects.areaMonitoringAppDescription: This is an application for controlling data from monitoring areas using Ultra Wideband technology. It is a web application with an Angular framework-based interface. The server-side of the application has been developed using Java Spring Boot with a microservices architecture, and all data is managed in a PostgreSQL database. All the message to user are sending by asynchronous message queue by Apache Kafka. This is my Engineering work, and I have personally written all the code.
